page.title: 05MEANINGS OF SOME PLACE NAMES
page.content: Some place names in our area give a hint about the environment. CRAIGROTHIE - there are two ideas as to what the name means. Some say "surrounded by hills like a wheel"; others say" roe deer on the hill" .We think the second is the more likely. CHANCE INN - this used to be CHANGE INN. It was one of the stops in coaching days where a fresh team of horses could be harnessed. SKELPIE - a cliff CARSKERDO - a dark grey fort TEASSES - moist and damp CASSENDILLY - a leafy shady path.
